info.title: Contract Accounting Business Partner Invoice â€“ Read
info.description:
Read invoice items for a business partner and read the corresponding invoice headers with this service. For each invoice you can read correspondence data including the printed document.

Only use the version 2 of the service. Do not use version 1 as this version is deprecated.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve a list of Contract Accounting (FI-CA) invoices from your SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Contract Accounting Open Item Management Integration(SAP_COM_0361)
[Contract Accounting - Open Item Management(2UJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2UJ " Link To BP ")
[Contract Accounting: Open Item Management(PUJ)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PUJ " Link To BP ")
